contexts:
As a child of a table element, after any
   caption elements and before any thead,
   tbody, tfoot, and tr
   elements.
content_model: If the span attribute is present: Nothing.
If the span attribute is absent: Zero or more col and template elements.
tag_omission:
A colgroup element's start tag can be
  omitted if the first thing inside the colgroup element is a col element,
  and if the element is not immediately preceded by another colgroup element whose
  end tag has been omitted. (It can't be omitted if the element
  is empty.)

A colgroup element's end tag can be omitted
  if the colgroup element is not immediately followed by ASCII whitespace
  or a comment.
content_attributes: span â€”  Number of columns spanned by the element
